talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're the most famous hot springs
these lands over.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just cross that bridge and head south—
ya can't miss 'em!
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is just what I heard from the elderly
fella who's a regular at <clr:0000>Goron Hot
Springs<clr:ffff>. Guy knows his stuff.
He says Simmerstone is in a place called
<clr:0000>Gorko Tunnel<clr:ffff>, which is farther south than
<clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs<clr:ffff>.
But that area is expansive, so if you're
going there, I recommend you ask him
for specifics.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The water here sure is nice.<sp:5:1:0> Nothin' beats
soakin' in the sunshine.
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Yikes, that's cold! <sp:5:1:0>Don't rain on my
good mood...
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The water here sure is nice.<sp:5:1:0> Nothin' beats
soakin' in the morning light.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The water here sure is nice.<sp:5:1:0> Nothin' beats
soakin' in the evening light.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The water here sure is nice.<sp:5:1:0> Nothin' beats
soakin' in the moonlight.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's an elderly fella at Goron Hot
Springs who really knows his stuff when
it comes to hot springs.
He told me about a place called
<clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff> that's
apparently legendary.
I can't decide whether to go to <clr:0000>Goron
Hot Springs<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If the president hadn't gotten involved
with <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, none of this
would've happened.
At this rate, the Southern Mine—no,
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>—is finished...
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The young Gorons are back to work, and
<clr:0000>Mine-Cart Land <clr:ffff>was completed safely.

I think it's about time I retire and tour
some hot springs.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Suppose I'll start with <clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs<clr:ffff>.


Actually, maybe I'll go farther than
that. Maybe I'll take a peek at
<clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>.
